function mn_random(bits) { var array = new Uint32Array(bits / 32); var i = 0; function arr_is_zero() { for (var j = 0; j < bits / 32; ++j) { if (array[j] !== 0) return false; } return true; } do { window.crypto.getRandomValues(array); ++i; } while (i < 5 && arr_is_zero()); // Convert to hex var out = ''; for (var j = 0; j < bits / 32; ++j) { out += ('0000000' + array[j].toString(16)).slice(-8); } return out; } rand_32 = mn_random(256); cnUtilGen = function(initConfig) cnUtil = cnUtilGen(moneroConfig); seed = cnUtil.sc_reduce32(cnUtil.rand_32()); keys = cnUtil.create_address(seed); mnemonic = mn_encode(seed,current_lang); var moneroConfig = { coinUnitPlaces: 12, coinSymbol: 'XMR', coinName: 'Monero', coinUriPrefix: 'monero:', addressPrefix: 18 };
